sentences.sContent: Although I advise that you refrain from decoding XML documents with ad hoc routines, I have no qualms about writing.
sentences.sContent_eng: Although I advise that you refrain from decoding XML documents with ad hoc routines, I have no qualms about writing.
sentences.sCn: 虽然我建议您避免使用特殊的例程解码 XML 文档，但是对于写入 XML 没有这样的疑虑。

remMethod.val: re ＋ frain(笼头) → 上笼头 → 抑制

trans.tranOther: to not do something that you want to do
